name: Improved DC Battery Backup Wall Mount Wi-Fi Garage Door Opener, Space-Saving, no Cable Tension Monitor, Heavy Lifting, LED Lighting System
description: The LiftMaster 98022 is an advanced wall-mount garage door opener featuring a space-saving design, ultra-quiet DC motor, integrated battery backup for power outages, built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for easy connectivity, and myQ app integration for remote control and monitoring. It supports heavy doors up to 850 lbs and includes smart safety features like automatic door locking and motion detection.
shortDescription: Wall-mount DC battery backup Wi-Fi opener with ultra-quiet operation, space-saving design, heavy lifting, and myQ connectivity.
features: Smart: Space-saving wall-mount design opens up ceiling space; Built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for easy connection; myQ Remote LED Light for maintenance-free illumination; myQ Mobile App for alerts and remote control
Quiet Operation: Wall-mount design with powerful ultra-quiet DC motor eliminates noise and vibrations through the ceiling
Reliable: Integrated battery backup for access during power outages; Lifetime motor warranty, 5-year parts, 1-year battery and accessories
Safe and Secure: Timer-to-Close (1, 5, 10 min or custom); Security+ 2.0 sends new code with every click; Motion detector turns on lights; Protector System auto-reverses on obstruction

specifications.motor: Medium-Duty 12V DC, automatic thermal protection, permanent lubrication
specifications.mechanics: Steel chassis and plastic cover, internal chain and sprocket drive (63:1 gear reduction), auto-force adjustment, DC Wi-Fi logic with built-in Bluetooth and surge suppressor, up to 850 lbs lift capacity
specifications.power: 120V AC, 60 Hz, 1.5A current rating, UL Listed, 6' power cord (3-prong)
specifications.speed: 8.5 inches per second upward, 7.6 inches per second downward

dimensions.head: 22" L x 7.25" W x 7.5" H
dimensions.headroomRequired: 3 in from center of torsion bar
